Bookmark App

Name Category Language Date Added Actions Edit Button Delete Button
{{ bookmark.name }} {{ bookmark.category }} {{ bookmark.language }} {{ bookmark.dateAdded }} ... Edit
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Bookmark } from '../Models/bookmark.interface'; import { BookmarkService } from '../Services/bookmark.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { bookmarks: Bookmark[] = [{ id: 1, name: 'test', category: 'string', language: 'test', dateAdded: new Date() }, { id: 1, name: 'test', category: 'string', language: 'test', dateAdded: new Date() }]; constructor(private bookmarkService: BookmarkService) { this.bookmarks = this.bookmarkService.getBookmarks(); } deleteBookmark(id: number): void { this.bookmarkService.deleteBookmark(id); } }
